description: [Latrodectus](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1160) has used a two-tiered C2 configuration with tier one nodes connecting to the victim and tier two nodes connecting to backend infrastructure.(Citation: Latrodectus APR 2024)

external_references.description: Proofpoint Threat Research and Team Cymru S2 Threat Research. (2024, April 4). Latrodectus: This Spider Bytes Like Ice . Retrieved May 31, 2024.
